item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: If you go to the website you can add collaborators to a board. I think you're talking about boxedup.com which I used to use to keep track of wish list items http://www.boxedup.com/kingkool68/want
item.content:encoded: If you go to the website you can add collaborators to a board. I think you’re talking about boxedup.com which I used to use to keep track of wish list items http://www.boxedup.com/kingkool68/want

item.title: By: Pammy
item.dc:creator: Pammy
item.description: Obviously I adore Pinterest. How do you and Kristina share a board? I didn't realize they had that feature, but perhaps it's not available on the iphone app, which I use primarily. I enjoyed snooping your gimmiebar to scope out Xmas gifts for you this year!
item.content:encoded: Obviously I adore Pinterest. How do you and Kristina share a board? I didn’t realize they had that feature, but perhaps it’s not available on the iphone app, which I use primarily. I enjoyed snooping your gimmiebar to scope out Xmas gifts for you this year!
